level.heading: No distribution on account of dissociation.
level.text: A person shall not have a right to receive a distribution on account of dissociation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 505 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act).
